showerReviews.reviewText: Needs to be updated but overall, not a bad place to stop.. Showers are small and no place to put your bag unless you put it on the floor. I don't like to do that. You may not mind.. Showers are decent with hot water. Water pressure could be …

… smile! My order was perfect, and the meatloaf plate was awesome.  Quan was very courteous and professional, and my shower room was spotless! Jessie at the fuel desk was helpful and eager to solve my card problem (I know, right? When does …

I'm always surprised to see amazing customer service from folks who don't owe me anything.  Thank you, Angelo, for being so kind to this dirty hiker and for helping me navigate shower and laundry.  What a restful and productive stop-over! G …
… Other than that. Clean shower, clean store, really good restaurant, although limited hours. Acceptable amount of paid parking.

Good people plenty of selection of stuff but if you are in a hurry to take a shower forget about it. Every time I come here for one I wait 20 plus minutes. Not because they’re full but because of waiting for the day time worker to clean the …

… was worth it. Lunch, not so much, 10 bucks for  tenders and fries that was clearly a child size portion.  The exterior needs a lil tlc (potholes and the wafting smell of urine) gave me pause but the restrooms and shower area was spotless.

Asked for a team shower and guy gave us one shower saying they big enough for 2! me  and my co driver are just that co drivers and then had the nerve to act mad some lady fixed it and the showers are clean but I hate how I'm already tired …

… full and it was and had to pay $14  for  reserved parking. Very clean shower, store is clean and organizes with your normal rape the trucker high truckstop prices. I treated myself to the Country Pride Restaurant and the buffet was good. …

… is dry as a bone, spaghetti has minimal sauce and also looks dry, just to list  a couple issues.  Grab my free shower and then walk over to the Flying J to eat at Perkins. Food at Perkins is fresh, staff is friendly, and prices  are great. …

I must of got lucky had none of the problems that we're posted everything was clean parking lot was full but I got one of the last spots only waited 10 minutes for shower. All in all not to bad for being in this area. I try to avoid the …

showerReviews.reviewText: Had to stop here cause Pilot showers not working, well let’s say the shower was nasty as all out doors. Hair and nats were all over the walls and hair in sink, see why no one stops at these locations for showers
Great truck stop! Convenient location right off the highway. People there are friendly and helpful & bathroom and shower facilities are clean.

Nasty!!! Stopped here during a snow storm went to take a shower it was small and looked not clean I ended up getting a rash on my arm and making a complaint to corporate they never did anything about it. Becareful don’t risk it if it looks …

Never taking a shower here again.. Unsanitary is the nicest way i could put it.. Major thing that set me off was the pubic hairs left in the sink and what looked like hair on the floor from someone shaving their head with clippers. There …
Why can't the cleaners simply wipe each surface down in each shower room once a day with vinegar shower room down once a day. They would stay much cleaner and not allow mold to grow at all.
If I could put zero stores I would, the shower was dirty, horrible customer service

… me sick the next day, small restroom, you cannot accommodate a lot of driver a day(150 parking for trailer) 3 shower room you cannot lock when you are cleaning yourself.  Rude employees, I can make a 200 pages book with what's wrong here
Only 3 showers,  cannot lock your shower door. Sink was clogged up. Shower took 7 min to get hot water. Only 1 ply toilet paper. …

The store is a dump. Light in the shower didn't work, didn't have a water tight cover and was about to fall down. Also the water was Luke warm. I sent pics to pilot and they wrote back saying it wasn't a company store so there was nothing …
It's a TA now. It is open. Was able to get a shower but they don't pride in keeping them clean. Small building but they are offering a food selection or there's a little diner across the street

This place does not even deserve 1 star. I parked for my 34 here and went to take a shower and when I say they do not clean the showers at all I mean not at all. Now I know the little that pilots do far as wipe a shower down with a towel …

Parking lot is huge. Pot holes everywhere.  Tried to go for a shower at 4 am, was told no showers until 5 cause they had nobody to clean them. Bathrooms were disgusting. Some local POS driving around parking lot blaring horn all throughout …

… gas station that the country has!!!! disgusting toilets. the lady who attends here is a complete lazy .. do not offer shower only because they do not want!!!!.. this place is the worst they should close it or change the administration ... …

showerReviews.reviewText: This is not the Pilot anymore. It's TA Express. Tons of FREE paved parking, showers, laundry and some of the best food I've had up here!! All of the staff are welcoming and friendly! Including the truck wash!!! Did I mention the food. Even the music is on point!! All of the fuel pumps are working and brand new.

This place is like night and day compared to the last time I was here. Very clean, professional and kind people working here, definitely highly recommended. Clean, good food and most importantly people that work here takes pride in their …

I've been reading some of the bad reviews over the years. To my point all the reviews older than 2 years should be removed. This place has a new management feel. BIG parking log (free) and potholes are no more. bathroom and shower look …

If there’s a 0 rating, i would have definitely given this truck stop a 0. Pumps are out. Only 2 showers plus, there’s a sign saying if you stay in the shower for more than 30 minutes, you’ll be charged 20$. Washroom is filthy. Staff is lazy. Potholes in the parking. I’ll never stop here again. It’s traumatizing.

Nice little spot overall, sub- sandwiches (closed at 7 pm but they are pretty good if you can make it.)
3 showers, clean, hot water and good pressure, they añso have hot sandwiches at the counter.

Nice big parki g area. Truck wash. Scale. Coffee I side. Small fueling area, subway inside. Diner next door.... Overall, good place. I would certainly reccomend this place to a fellow truck without a doubt. If lot is full, there are spots to make ur own parking if you are creative.

Lots of ICE CREAM in the cooler if that’s your thing. They do have a couple showers, they were updated with glass doors and clean at the time I stopped in. I have posted the shower prices and a few photos of the coolers.  Be safe out there …
Nice little spot tucked away when the big chain truck stops are packed. Having shower is a bonus

… then breakfast this morning. Nothin so amazing that I would come back for..  Definitely a clean facility, didn't take shower but restrooms were clean. Also keep in mind this Pennsylvania and they have the no idle signs everywhere, local …
Payed 12 bucks for a shower only to find they don't clean between uses, it was flat nasty plus the door wudnt latch shut.
